name: 3D Slicer Scene Description File
summary: An MRML file is a 3D scene created by Slicer (also known as 3D Slicer), a free 3D modeling and visualization program used to create medical images. It is saved using the Slicer MRML XML format. Each MRML file includes references to 3D datasets and scene properties, which are used to construct the 3D scene.
